column.name: DWH_SOURCE_IND
column.comment: Indicator from which system the data record comes (2: Debit, 3: Credit).

column.name: MARKET_CODE
column.comment: Market to which the customer is assigned. Examples are MMC (credit customers who have a contract with VfD2), PUC (credit customers who have a contract with a partner company), MMO (prepaid customers who are directly assigned to VfD2), PUA (prepdaid customers who have a partner company) are), XMK ​​(Cross Market).

column.name: BAN
column.comment: Indication of the customer's billing account number. The customer is the (natural or legal) person to whom services are provided on the basis of a contract concluded with D2-Vodafone. The customer is responsible for payment for the services used by himself or by other participants belonging to him. If the customer account is assigned to a higher-level account (consolidated account), the higher-level account can also be responsible for payment.

column.name: ENT_SEQ_NO
column.comment: Entity sequence number

column.name: SYS_CREATION_DATE
column.comment: Date of creation of the data record in the operative system

column.name: SYS_UPDATE_DATE
column.comment: Date of modification of the data record in the operative system

column.name: OPERATOR_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the last user

column.name: APPLICATION_ID
column.comment: Unique ID of the application that last processed the sentence

column.name: DEPOSIT_DATE
column.comment: This value usually represents the date on which the payment was deposited in the bank. If there is no bank deposit, this value is set to the payment posting date.

column.name: DEPOSIT_BANK_CODE
column.comment: The code of the bank where the payment is deposited.

column.name: PYM_METHOD
column.comment: The payment method of the BAN. Valid values: "DD" - direct debit, "CA" - cash, "CC" - credit card, "MT" - money transfer.

column.name: PYM_SUB_METHOD
column.comment: The payment sub method of the BAN.

column.name: BANK_CODE
column.comment: This identifies the customer's bank.

column.name: BANK_ACCOUNT_NO
column.comment: The customer's bank account number

column.name: CHECK_NO
column.comment: The number of the payment check.

column.name: CR_CARD_NO
column.comment: Contains the customer's credit card number for the regular monthly bill payment.

column.name: CR_CARD_AUTH_CODE
column.comment: The code issued as an authorisation that the credit card is valid.

column.name: DIRCT_DBT_VOUCHER
column.comment: A unique number that identifies the request. An Oracle sequence number.

column.name: ORIGINAL_BAN
column.comment: The original BAN for which the payment was intended.

column.name: SUBSCRIBER_NO
column.comment: Teilnehmernummer

column.name: SOURCE_TYPE
column.comment: This is the source type of the payment.

column.name: SOURCE_ID
column.comment: This attribute identifies the specific clearinghouse to which the payment is sent.

column.name: DEALER_COMP_CODE
column.comment: This is the code of the dealer against which the payment has been created. Company Type (if the dealer class is organisation). Examples: Internal, External national, External foreign etc.

column.name: PYM_REFERENCE1
column.comment: This is the payment data to be displayed on screen/reports associated with reference 1. The meaning of the reference is defined by the table PAYMENT_METHOD.

column.name: RECEIPT_ID
column.comment: This is the ID of the POS receipt, issued to the customer for the payment. This occurs for O/L payments in a call centre or at a Dealer's shop.

column.name: AGENCY_CODE
column.comment: Contains the ID of the collection agency assigned to the account at the time of the activity.

column.name: CONV_RUN_NO
column.comment: Used for conversion.

column.name: RMS_INV_STORE_ID
column.comment: The ID of the RMS store as it appears on the invoice.

column.name: RMS_INV_ID
column.comment: The ID of the RMS reference as it appears on the invoice.

column.name: RMS_REF_STORE_ID
column.comment: First part of the RMS document reference, which identifies the store location.

column.name: RMS_REF_ID
column.comment: The ID of the RMS reference.

column.name: RMS_REF_ACTV_TYPE
column.comment: The activity type, when made by an RMS store.

column.name: CR_CARD_EXP_DATE
column.comment: The credit card expiration date.

column.name: DESIGNATION
column.comment: The invoice type to which the payment is designated.

column.name: DD_CONTRACT_NO
column.comment: The customers ID at the bank or credit-card company. For payments received for direct debit customers.

column.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
column.comment: This attribute contains the invoice number for payments posted to a specific invoice.

column.name: ORIGINAL_CURRENCY
column.comment: The original currency used in creation of credits and one time charges via CSM (before translation to the other currency). Billing calculates charges and credits in both currencies. Null - Billing charges, DM - DMark, EUR - Euro.

column.name: HANDLED_BY
column.comment: The ID of the operator that locked the payment is contained in this field. This payment cannot be handled by any other operator than the one specified in this field.

column.name: EU_ORIGINAL_AMT
column.comment: This is the original amount, in Euro

column.name: EU_AMT_DUE
column.comment: The total Euro amount which the customer was requested to pay in the bill. This might not be the same as the payment amount.

column.name: COLL_AGENCY_CODE
column.comment: When a payment is received from a collection agency, this field is populated with the collection agency code. Such payments will not be included in the collection agency interface file.

column.name: CUSTOMER_NAME
column.comment: The name of the customer as received from bank transfer file from the bank.

column.name: PYM_WORK_STS
column.comment: Status of payment work

column.name: VOUCHER_ID
column.comment: The Voucher id used to replenish prepaid subscriber.

column.name: SP_PROCESS_DATE
column.comment: Service Provider processing date.

column.name: IBAN
column.comment: International Bank Account Number - Customer''''''''s IBAN from which the payment was done

column.name: BIC
column.comment: Bank Identifier Code - Customer''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''s BIC from which the payment was done

column.name: DEPOSIT_IBAN
column.comment: Customer's IBAN from which the payment was done - Customer's IBAN from which the payment was done
